item.title: About me
item.description: In this blog space I like to post about game dev, foods, and occasional random thoughts. I keep this mainly as my own recipe storage; for both games I develop and also great foods I find all over. Enjoy your stay!

item.title: Project: Pajatso
item.description: This project is a 2D game created with the Godot game engine. The game is a remake of the old classic pajatso gambling game. The player’s goal is to shoot coins in to boxes to score. You can adjust the strength of the shot by following the bar progress. You’re able to get more coins by when the timer is done counting down. Once the timer is done press the get more coins button.

item.title: Simple meatballs
item.description: Simple meatballs that can be prepared in a short amount of time.

item.title: Potato salad
item.description: An oil based potato salad that is perfect for summer days
